name: The 7th Int'l Symposium on Computational and Applied Mathematics
content: The 7th Int'l Symposium on Computational and Applied Mathematics (ISCAM 2024) will be held in Sanya, China on November 15-17, 2024\. ISCAM 2024 will cover issues on Computational and Applied Mathematics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
